mapper.select: SELECT FC_INDEX AS fcIndex, FC_NAME AS fcName, FC_GRAM AS fcGram, FC_CAL AS fcCal, FC_TAN AS fcTan, FC_DAN AS fcDan, FC_FAT AS fcFat, FC_SUGAR AS fcSugar, FC_NAT AS fcNat FROM (SELECT FOOD_CALORIE_TBL.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY 1 DESC) AS NUM FROM FOOD_CALORIE_TBL ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT FC_INDEX AS fcIndex, FC_NAME AS fcName, FC_GRAM AS fcGram, FC_CAL AS fcCal, FC_TAN AS fcTan, FC_DAN AS fcDan, FC_FAT AS fcFat, FC_SUGAR AS fcSugar, FC_NAT AS fcNat FROM FOOD_CALORIE_TBL WHERE FC_INDEX = #{fcIndex}

SELECT HC_INDEX AS hcIndex, HC_NAME AS hcName, HC_TYPE AS hcType, HC_HARD AS hcHard, HC_SET AS hcSet, HC_CAL AS hcCal, HC_EXPLAIN AS hcExplain, HC_VIDEO AS hcVideo FROM (SELECT HC_CALORIE_TBL.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY 1 DESC) AS NUM FROM HC_CALORIE_TBL ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT HC_INDEX AS hcIndex, HC_NAME AS hcName, HC_TYPE AS hcType, HC_HARD AS hcHard, SUBSTR(HC_SET,1,LENGTH(HC_SET)-3) AS hcSet, HC_CAL AS hcCal, HC_EXPLAIN AS hcExplain, HC_VIDEO AS hcVideo FROM HC_CALORIE_TBL WHERE HC_INDEX = #{hcIndex}
